name: Happy Drugs
description:
Happy Drugs is a satire game about an alien party where you are the drug dealer. Check your clients for fake money, hand out the correct drugs and become the best seller of the block!
The game was created in the context of a student organized Game Jam! The two Topics consisted of "Stamp" and "Happy".

[Disclaimer: This is a satire game. This game does not glorify drugs in any way. We do not recommend actually taking drugs. Rather take our advice: Be smart. Don't take drugs.]
